version.title: Engine Version
version.description: The semantic version of the engine that is supported

dependency.title: Dependency
dependency.description: Dependencies are specified with a package name/slug to version range, local file path, URL, or Git/SVN endpoint. The version range is a string which has one or more space-separated descriptors.

person.description: A person who has been involved in creating or maintaining this package

title: Package Manifest
description: Configuration file for a CFML package

location.title: Location
location.description: Location of where to download the package. Overrides ForgeBox location

directory.title: Directory
directory.description: Install directory where this package should be placed once installed. If not defined, it installs were the CommandBox command was executed.

createPackageDirectory.title: Create Package Directory
createPackageDirectory.description: This determines if the container directory will contain a sub-directory according to the package slug name. The default is true

packageDirectory.title: Package Directory
packageDirectory.description: This name will be used for the package sub-directory instead of the slug name

type.title: Repository Type
type.description: The version control system. Popular examples are git, svn, or mercurial

url.title: Repository URL
url.description: The URL at which the repository resides

description.title: Description
description.description: ForgeBox big description. If not set, it can be taken from a Readme.md, Readme, or Readme.txt

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.description: Install instructions. If not set, it can be taken from a instructions.md, instructions, or instructions.txt

changelog.title: Change Log
changelog.description: Change log. If not set, it can be taken from a changelog.md, changelog, or changelog.txt

private.title: Private
private.description: Designates the package as a private ForgeBox package. Private packages are not publicly accessible, but still offer all the benefits of ForgeBox.

defaultEngine.description: The name of the default CFML engine for the `start` command to use.

defaultPort.description: Deprecated. The HTTP port the server will be started on when you use the start command. Use `port` in `server.json` instead.

projectURL.title: Project URL
projectURL.description: Default project URL if not using CommandBox start server commands

license.title: Licenses
license.description: List of licenses the package can have

items.title: License
items.description: A license the package can have

type.title: License Type
type.description: The license type. For example, MIT.

url.title: License URL
url.description: The URL at which the license resides

installPaths.title: Install Paths
installPaths.description: Tracks install locations so uninstall can work. The key is the package name/slug and the value is the path

scripts.title: Scripts
scripts.description: Set of script commands that correspond to the interception points in CommandBox or arbitrary names that can be run with the `run-script` command

preInstall.description: Run BEFORE the package is installed

onInstall.description: Run WHILE the package is installed

postInstall.description: Run AFTER the package is installed

preUninstall.description: Run BEFORE the package is uninstalled

postUninstall.description: Run AFTER the package is uninstalled

preVersion.description: Run BEFORE bump the package version

postVersion.description: Run AFTER bump the package version, but BEFORE Git repo is tagged

onRelease.description: Run AFTER bump the package version and AFTER Git repo is tagged

prePublish.description: Run BEFORE the package is published

postPublish.description: Run AFTER the package is published

ignore.title: Ignore
ignore.description: List of file globs to ignore when installing the package similar to .gitignore patterns

runner.title: TestBox Runner
runner.description: The URI location of the test runner for an app or several with slug names

items.description: The runner URIs mapped to slug names

labels.title: Labels List
labels.description: A list of labels to only include when running the tests

items.description: A label a spec must have to be ran

excludes.title: Exclude List
excludes.description: A list of labels to exclude when running the tests

items.description: A label to be excluded from the test run
